text: Portrait of an American Family is the first studio album by American rock band, Marilyn Manson. It was released on July 19, 1994. The producers of the album were Trent Reznor and Marilyn Manson. The bassist for the band, Gidget Gein, was fired after the making of the album. ==Songs== ==References== Category:1994 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Marilyn Manson albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Portrait of an American Family
